law.catch_line: Barber shop lessee as independent contract owner -- Limitation of barber shop operator's liability.

text.section: For purposes of subsection (2) of this section, any person engaged in barbering who is licensed as a barber and who leases or rents space at a barber shop from the holder of a license to operate the barber shop shall be deemed an independent contract owner.

The board shall not hold the holder of a license to operate a barber shop responsible for violations of this chapter, or of administrative regulations promulgated pursuant to this chapter, that are committed by an independent contract owner.

law.history: Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 32, sec. 9, effective July 12, 2006. -- Created 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 9, sec. 1, effective July 13, 2004.
